title: Best of 2021 w/ Joey Cahill (6131 Records, Wanna Hear It Records) & Jeremy Bolm (Touche Amore, The First Ever Podcast, Secret Voice)
itunes:title: Best of 2021 w/ Joey Cahill (6131 Records, Wanna Hear It Records) & Jeremy Bolm (Touche Amore, The First Ever Podcast, Secret Voice)
description:
It's the most wonderful time of the year where we gather around our microphones and discuss what records myself, Joey and Jeremy enjoyed the most. Joking aside, it's one of my favorite things to do...talk about music! It's a long one, so enjoy!

Playlist of all our favorite records!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
